page.title: 04PARTRIDGE GREEN HOUSING
page.content: Our area of mostly PRIVATE HOUSES includes:-large established farm houses with acres of land,village houses built when the railway came in the 1860's and mainly SEMI-DETACHED houses built on one of the villages 4 ESTATES.A typical semi-detached house built by CROUDACE in 1973 has 3 bedrooms and a bathroom upstairs,kitchen,dining room/lounge and hall downstairs.There is a garden at the front and back.The cost is about Â£42,000.Usually 4 or 5 people live in such a house."The Rise" estate built in 1967 is all bungalows lived in by older,retired people,some of them widows or widowers.They like the village because it is quiet and friendly.Some of the very elderly residents live in "Peacocks"flats where a matron keeps an eye on their well being.
